name: Armored Exercise
prereq: Swordmaster Dedication; Trained In Light, Medium, Or Heavy Armor
summary: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords.
description:
You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords. Your proficiency rank for light, medium, and heavy armor increases to expert for whichever of those you already had the trained proficiency rank in.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
